sen.e: Sasakiyama gimi or Sasakiyama no kimi (沙沙貴山君) is one of the powerful families in the ancient times.

sen.j: 祖先は陵戸(みささぎのへ)で沙沙貴(ささき)の名前も陵戸が変化した物と言う説があるが、日本書紀には「狭々城山君韓袋宿裲」（ささきやまぎみからふくろのすくね）が雄略天皇による押磐皇子謀殺に荷担したために罰せられ、死刑とする代わりに身分を落とし賤民である陵戸とされ全ての官籍を剥奪の上で山部連の下に置かれたが、同族の「置目老嫗」（おきめのおみな）が押磐皇子の遺骨の所在を知らせた功により置目老嫗の兄である「倭袋宿裲」が韓袋宿裲に代わり狭々城山君の姓を賜ったとある。
sen.e: There is a theory that the name Sasaki was changed from the ancestor's name Misasagi no He, however, in Nihonshoki it was written that 'Sasakiyama gimi Karafukuro no Sukune' helped the Emperor Yuryaku to murder the prince Oshiha and therefore he was demoted to humble rank Ryoko instead of death penalty and transferred under Yamabe no muraji after deprived any title, but because 'Okime no Omina' from his family told where the remains of the prince Oshiha were placed, 'Yamato Fukuro no Sukune' was ginven the name Sasaki in place of Karafukuro no Sukune.

sen.cmt: 日本書紀の定訳’→'prince→PrinceSasaki→Sasakiyama gimi「置目老嫗の兄である」訳漏れ対応しました。

sen.j: このことから、狭々城山君の姓は陵戸とは無関係に存在していたと考えられ、実際には仁徳天皇の名代である雀部(ささきべ／ささべ)を祖先とする一族だと思われる。
sen.e: Because of that, it is thought that the family name of Sasakiyama gimi would be nothing to do with Misasagi no He and it would be a family descended from Sasakibe (or Sasabe) owned by the Emperor Nintoku.

sen.e: It is thought that the family Sasakiyama gimi which kept the power until the Heian period, was, at least, a part of the Sasaki clan from the Uda-Genji (Minamoto clan).
